disturb_hist: ungrazed since establishment of NutNet plots in 2007

Grazed for ~80 years until 2005, now lightly and intermittently grazed by cattle
Mowing of hay once per year (after sampling).

Grazed multiple decades, grazing stopped ~5 years before start of experiment; Note:  trenching was not performed until November, 2020, but an additional buffer was implemented for sampling prior to trenching
